IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BETAFEATURES WHERE VirtualRooftopID=2150293 AND FEATURENAME like 'CommonSignIn%')
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO BETAFEATURES
    (DateCreated,CreatedByUserID,DateModified,ModifiedByUserID,FeatureName,VirtualRooftopID)
    VALUES
    (GETDATE(),1,GETDATE(),1,'CommonSignIn_10/22/2019',2150293)
END

UPDATE Logins
Set ExternalIdentifier = '11111-22222-33333'
WHERE Username = 'readyAPI_Bridge' 

  Update Users
  Set IsDefaultUser = 1
  WHERE CachedLoginUsername like '%readyAPI_Organization%'
